Discrete Distribution (prob140.DiscreteDistribution)¶

class prob140.DiscreteDistribution(labels=None, _deprecated=None, *, formatter=<datascience.formats.Formatter object>)[source]¶

Subclass of Table to represent discrete distributions as a 2-column table of Domain and Probability.

For constructing a Distribution, see documentation for FiniteDistribution and InfiniteDistribution.

  • Finite Distribution (prob140.FiniteDistribution)
  • Infinite Distribution (prob140.InfiniteDistribution)

Methods¶

These methods are inherited by FiniteDistribution and InfiniteDistribution

DiscreteDistribution.prob_event(x) Finds the probability of an event x
DiscreteDistribution.event(x) Shows the probability that distribution takes on value x or range of values x.
DiscreteDistribution.plot([width, mask]) Plots the histogram for a Distribution
DiscreteDistribution.plot_event(event[, width])
Parameters:
plot Class method for overlay multiple distributions
